DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to evaluate the efficacy of myo-inositol in preventing gestational diabetes in high risk pregnant women.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Myo-inositol in Preventing Gestational Diabetes in High-risk Pregnant Women
DOC.criteria: 60 women in their first trimester of pregnancy affected by one or more of the following risk factors: Glycemia levels > 92 mg/dl BMI > 30 At least a parent or a brother (or sister)affected by diabetes Preexisting pregnancy with gestational diabetes Pregnant women affected by pregestational diabetes Twin pregnancy Patients affected by preexisting diseases in pregnancy (diabetes excluded) Patients affected by chronic disorders
